div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day the court wardit schew for lawe ande It was gevin for dome that
patry musky hade failyet in his preive anent the pament of androw murray malis
of his landis of the newburghe' quhilkis the said patry Occupeis ande awe to mak
the said androue pament tharof

The saide day thomas lesly balye grantit to ansuer to Dauy mar youngar
in ony thingis that he hed' to say to bessy blinsell his wif

The said day the bailyes ordanyt ande chargit thomas ridall to deliuer ande
restor to Dauy colpe tutor to Isabell buchane' the Countor pertenit tile him of
ayrschipe eftir the tenor of the actis maide tharupoun' obefor Ande Williame scrimgeor
sergeand' at commande of the balyeis chargit the said thomas be his wande of office to
remane within the tolbutht vneto the tyme he deliuer the said Comptour to the
said Dauid Abrigat' hoc act' in absencia clericij

The said day Dauy mar was in ane amerciamernt of the court for the
wranguis' manuring of the forlandis perteninge to bessy blinsele spouse
to thomas leslie ande It was ordanyt be the said assis' that the said
Dauy suld pay v s' to the said thomas in his wifis name

The said day Androue bavne and Johne' stevinsoun' his seruand' was quyt
be ane suorne assis' Duncane Colisoun' forspekar for the wranguis' takin
and Intrometinge of certane skynnis clamyt be henry bavne for the
quhilk the saide henry was in ane amerciament of the court ande thai
quyt of his challance

The said day the balyeis chargit thome Ridale to restor the Countour clamyt
be Dauy colp eftir the tenor of the actis maide obefor Ande William scrimgeour
sergeand' chargit the saide thomas to fulfile the samyne or he passit yed' out
of the tolbutht be his wande of office

Curia balliuoum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiijo die
nouembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd' miles Dauid menyes gilbertus menyeis Andreas
cullane Dauid mar Robertus crage thomas Waus patricius lesly Dauid
fynne georgeus bisset Johannes annand' Johannes chapman et andrea stratoun'
burgensis dictj burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander bauerlay frater Katherine
bauerlay latricis presencium obijt vltra vestitus et Sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem
et fidem dominj nostri regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum extra
portam vice furcarum ex orientlai parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Alexandri Rolland
ex australi et terram quondam Roberti prat ex boreali Et quod dicta Katherina
est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dictj quondam Alexandri fratris sui de dictis
per annum xiij s' iiij d' Et valuit decim solidis tempore pacis Et quod tenetur
in capite de supprimo domino nostro rege Et nunc existunt in manibus Isabelle
Donaldson' Relicte quondam dicti Alexandri racione in conuicte infeodacionis
et cetera

The said day Williame harpar was conuictit be ane suorne assis'
androw cullan forspekar for the wranguis' withhaldinge of xviij lapis
fra sere Johne' ruthirfurde knycht quhilk the bailye chargit him to pay
within terme of lawe

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the consale that the baxtaris sale
prouide and furnes the tovne in brede of quhit gude and sufficient stuf et cetera
eftir the tenor of the statutis maide obefor Ande gif It happinnys thame to
falye that tharbe nay stuf of brede of quhit to serue the tovne thai sale
pay Ilk ane v merkis to Sanct nicholes werk vneforgevin

The said day Johne' of Cullan come souerte to Johne' chene of
Essilmond' knycht in the name of Katherine beuerlay sister and ane
of the ayris of vmquhile Alexander beuerlay for the gudis of ayrschipe
perteninge tile hir that Isabell donaldson' spous' to vmquhile
the saide Alexander beueraly Intromettit with and awe to ansuer of law and
resone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvii die mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day canne Eduardsoun' grantit hir awinge to the spous' of
Dauy steuart vi s' viij d' for ane boll of malt quhilk the bailyes
chargit hir to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day Androw nauchty deponit be his aitht that the larde of
allirdes causit him to punde Androw mortimar for viij s' quhuhilk
siluer the saide Androw pait him Ande he gef it to the larde of allirdes

add.foreign: protestacio dominj Johannis blak and Johannis mediltoun'

div.p:
The saide day sere Johne' Blak and Johne' of mediltoun' protestit that Johne'
Blak haue pament of ale his annuell aucht tile him of the lande
of Johne' thomsoun' liande betuix the lande of the larde of many one
the est and the kingis gatis one the west and southt partis of ale termes
bigane Ande the saide Johne' thomsone grantit to pay xxxvi s' and
ane merk of the saide annuell within xv dais

The saide day William scrimgeour was quyt of ale strubulance of the wif
of thome hay Ande scho was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
patry Rede forspekar for strubulance of the said' William Officiar'
et cetera

The xviij day of Nouember' the yer' of gode jM fyve hundretht
and thre yeris In presence of Johne Retre ane of the ballieis
of Abirdene Alexander Rede gilbert Ketht Richard' ruthirfurde and henry
Rede sere Johne ruthirfurd' Knicht dischargit him of the croft
Callit herdwerde pertening to Copin' hile Ande of ale vthiris
thingis pertening to the said' Copin Excepit this yeris tak
next eftir follouing of the saide croft the said' knight sale pay
tuelf Schillingis of maile at Witsonday next to cum to the
said' copin' ande vthir tuelf Schillingis at martimes in wattir
next thareftir of maile ande the saide Copin dischargit the saide
Knight of ale malys of the said' croft of ale termes bigane
and of ale vthir thingis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xx die
Nouembris anno quo Supra

The saide day gilbert johnestone grantit him aving to patry
chernside thre ferlotis of male for William Sandysone to be pat
within terme of law

The saide day magis moir' was conuictit be ane Surone
assis' gilbert menyeis forspekar for commone spilling of the
mercat et cetera Ande atour it was ordanit be the assis' that gif
euire it happinnis the saide magis to spek ony violent
lanagis to Johne Retre balye or tile Ony vthir honest
persone and beis conuict' tharof scho salbe secludit and bannist
out of the tone

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter Johannem malysone et Andream
mortymar continuatur vsque ad sextam proximam futuram cum consensu
partium

Eodem die Johannes malisone fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit
Jacobum Colisone suum legittimum procuratorem Actorem et factorem
In actione dependens indecisia inter ipsum et Andream mortymar
Agendum defendendum et cetera Ac promittens de Rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem xxiiij die Nouembris anno quo Supra

The saide day Williame scrogis his wiff and seruandis
was quyt of ale wrangis haldin and avay takin of
thome chapmannis gudis yerne and clatht that he
he had' in wirking' be his and thar' aith' gevin
to thame be the saide thomas

The saide day It was fundit ande deliuerit be the ballieis and
warde of the court that sere Johne rede chaplane of
Sanct James altar and vthiris chaplanis havande Infeftment
of ony annuele Rentis of the haile lande Inlande ande
forlande pertening to Johne malison' liande in the castalgat
of the quhilkis the forlande is wedset tile androu lousone
may pvnde ony part of the saide lande that is strenyeabile
for thar annuell' yerlie and termlie Ande quhar' the Inlande
of the saide tenement was bundin to fre the forlande of ale annuellis
to the saide Androw in his chartir becaus' the Inlande is wast the saide
forlande awe to pay the annuell' and the kingis maile

The penult day of nouember the yer of gode jM vc aan thre yeris the
ballieis Counsale and communite of Abirdene warnit be the hande bele and
officeris throw the hall toune gathtreit and circualy Inquerit be William
scrimgeour sergeand' Consentit grantit and ordanit ane commissione
vndir thar commone sele to be maid' and Selit in dev ferme contening
In it Alexander menyeis aldirman and Johne of mar' and send tile edinburghe
In continent to pas' tile our Souerane lordis hienes his lordis thesauraris
and Componitouris Ande compone for the landis of the barounry of stanevode
and Mukholl to be gevin to the aldirman balyeis Counsale and communite
forsaide heritablie in fewferme and fre burgage for ane compenc fewe
maile alanerlie

Be It Kende tile ale mene be thire present lettres ws bailyeis Counsale ande communite
of Aberdene tile haue maide constitut' ande ordanit ande be thire present lettres makis
constitutis ande ordanis oure hartli louit nichtbouris Alexander menyheis oure
aldermane Ande Johne' of mar ane of our balyeis oure werray lauchfule ande
vndoutit procuratouris actouris ffactouris ande speciale messengeris gevande
grantande ande committande to oure saide procuratouris ande to Ilkane of thame
Coniunctly ande Seueraly oure fule free lauchfule and plane pouer expres'
mandment ande charge for ws and in oure namis To pas tile oure Souerande
lordis hienes his lordis of counsale thesauraris componitouris factouris or
deputis quhatsumeuire hawande power tharto to compone witht thame
or ony of thame for the landis of the barrouny of Stanewode and Mukwelis
witht thare pertinence liande within the sereffdome of aberdene' To be gevin
to ws ande oure Successouris burges ande Inhabitantyis of the saide burghe'
heretably in fewferme' ande fre burgage for ane certane Sovme vsuale
money of Scotlande tobe gevin yerly tile hs hienes ande his successouris
kingis of Scotlande in fewe ferme alanerly The saide landis in oure
name tile ask and ressaue be chartir Sesin and possessione' in dewforme for the
Competent few ferme maile as salhappin thame to compoun' ande agre
Ande generalie ale vthir and Sindrie thingis to do excers' ande wse in the
said mater that we micht do and we war present haldinge and for to haulde
ferme and stabile ale and quhatsumeuire thingis oure saide procuratouris
Coniunctly and seueraly in the premiss' in oure namys ledis lauchfully
to be done In witnessinge of the quhilkis we haue appensit our common'
Seile to the lettres at aberdene' the pennult day of the Nouember the
yher of gode ane Thousand five hundreth and thre yeris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
primo die mensis decembris anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquiscionem Curie quod Agnes
Prat Est legittima et propinquior heres quondam cristine modane
matris sue

Eodem die Agnes Prat fecit constituit creauit et nominauit et
ordanit Johannem mydiltone suum legittimum procuratorem Actorem factorem
promittens Ad prosequendum et prosequen calumpniandum Alexandrum
Prat pro bonis Jure hereditario sibi racione decessus quondam
Jonete modane matris sue pertinens de receptis acquitandum
agendum defendendum eadem bona recipiendum promittens de Rato
et grato Cum ceteris terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day It was ordanit and fundin be the Inquest
of the court that patry chernside awe to ansuer' to the
borghe' fundin one him for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of demi Nest of covntouris demi nest of Coffris and iiijo li'
of waxe

The saide day patry chernside grantit to pay to Dauy mar' yongar
xvij s' et iiijor d' within aucht dais ande vij s' et vj d' gif he
previs nocht ane part of it pait for certan covntour and merchandice

The saide day magis blak was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauy
menyeis forspekar for the Spilling of the mercat and to amende as law
wile et cetera and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day the ballieis with ane avis' and ordanance of ane assis'
Dauy menyeis forspekar assignit this day xv dais tile Alexander Prat
tile ansuer perempturlie to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne of
mydiltone procurator to Anny prat his wif for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of Certane gudis of ayrschip and ordanit the saide Johne to
ger' put the gudis quhilkis he clamys in writ and deliuer the copy to
the saide Alexnader tharof

The saide day William gordoune In futy with Johne Cullane his forspekar
Offerit him redy thar' tile vndirlie the law anent the strubulance of
Dauy feldar' et cetera protestande to be quyt of his challance quhile
he be new warnit and for his Costis skathis et cetera

head.add: the money deliuerit to the ballieis sende to the aldirman in edinburghe

div.p:
The saide day thir personis eftir writin deliuerit the siluer and money
follouing to thomas leslie and Johne of mar' tua of the balyeis
to be sende to Alexander menyeis aldirman being in Edinburgh'
of thar' wattir' malys at commavnde of the tovne In the first
Jonhne Wormet deliuerit xxtj s' William Wormet tene s'
Johne Ratre tene s' patry Rede tene s' patry leslie tene s'
Richarde ruthirfurd' tene s' mathow branche tene s' and

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem xvi die mensis decembris anno quo supra

add.foreign: continuacio plegij inter Alexandrum Prat et johannem mydilton'

div.p:
The said' day the borghe' fundin one Alexander Prat be Johne
of mydiltone for certan gudis of areschip pertening tile anny
prat his wif was continevit in siclik strintht force and
effect as it is this day with consent of partj becaus' the
said' Alexander was sek and at the Instance of cristy Prat
to monunday the xviij day of this Instant of December'

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit be the consale
with consent and Assent of Williame buchan baxtar
Richerde redhede gilbert tulidef / thome straloche
Donalde baxtar / Alexander Donaldsone and Wile leslie
that ale the baxtaris of this burghe sale baik tua penny
breid' gude clene Stuff and wele bakin contening xxiiijor
vnce and penny breid' contening xij vnce Ande that thai
et Ilkane of thame sale pas' or sende for the balye
and officiar' of the quartar quhen thar breid' is dravin
and for the weing of thame that thai halde the pays' and be gude
ande cleyne Stuf Ande gif ony baxtar within this burghe
happinnis to falye in ony pont befor' writin sal pay xl s' to
Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin and salbe secludit the craft
for ane yer' hereftir And' atour thai sale haue Sufficient stuf
euire Redy to serue the tone ymang thame vndir the pane
forsaid'

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the Consal for common
gude of the toune that the four sergeandis wiffis salby nay' meile
nor' malt mar' thane wile sted' thame self to thar avne propire
vys' and sale nocht be fundin in the mercat tile exced' this statut vndir
the pane of bannising of thame out of the toune Ande that thare
hesbundis causs thame to keipe this statut vndir the pane of
tynsale of thar office

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo die
mensis decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde procurat forspekar' to Jonhne of
mydiltone askit Alexander prat to be Callit to Ansuer to the borghe' fundin
one him be the saide Johne mydiltone as procurator tile Anny Prat his
Spous' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of cristiane modanys hir' modir
weding and best Ring hir' best mantill hir best bedis of querele gandit
with Siluer and hir' best Siluer bruche as day of peremptor' quhilkis Alexander
lauchfullie Callit be the moutht of Ormonde leslie ane of the Officiaris and
nocht Comperit thareftir the saide knycht forspekar as saide Is fand' ane
borghe' in the hande of William scrimgeour ane of the Officiaris of the said'
burghe' that the saide Johne mydiltone as procurator for his said' spous'
hede Cumin to his clame of the saide gudis of airschipe and Recouerit
the samyn Ande askit warde and dome tharof In falt of null
defence Ande thareftir the said' Johne of mydiltone with his saide
forspekar being removit out the Court the balyis directit and send
William scrimgeor Officiar' to the saide Alexander requiring him to Cum or
send' ane procurator for him to defend' In the saide matir quhilk
passit and agancome ande schewe he mycht nocht nor he walde send
naman for him ande in continent the court wardit schew for law
and It was / gevin for dome that the saide Johne of mydiltone
as procurator to his saide Spous' hed' Recouerit the said' gudis of ayr/
schipe and the saide borghe' was fundin of waill for the quhilkis
the saide Alexander was in Ane amerciament

The saide day Alexander andirsone deponit be his aithe that he hed'
pait to Willaime of Ketht xvj s' et iij d' Scottis that Johne thomson'
clamyt aving to him be the saide Alexander akit in the buk Obefor

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
mensis decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day thomas Waus grantit him dettour to richerd Redhede for four
bollis of quhit quhilk the balyes chargit him to pay within terme' of law And'
Williame scrimgeour officiar at command' of the bailyeis chargit the said thomas
to pay within terme of lawe as saide Is et cetera

The saide day Willaime scrimgeour at commande of the balyes chargit Alexander
prat to remane within the tolbutht vnto the tym' he fulfile and pay the gudis of
ayrschipe to Johne' mediltoun' procuratour tile anny prat his wif Optenyt
one him and contenyt in the actis of the buk obefor

The said' day the wif of thomas Watsone the wif of richerde
Redhede the wif of cristy prat the wif of Alexander talyour the wif
of Johne Stewinson' the wif of Johne flessar Anny fergous'
besse bissat and the wif of cristj prat Ilkan of thame was in
ane amerciament of the court and conuict' be ane assis' Johne Cullane forspekar
for the brekin' of common' ordinance and Statut' of the tovne in the
bying of wittall' in vnlauchfull tyme and regrating' et cetera And' to
amend' as law will and forber' in tym' to Cum
